snippet: Sri Lanka reopened a rail link between Jaffna and the rest of the country on Monday, an event the government called a step toward reconciliation and national unity after a long civil war.
abstract: Sri Lanka reopens rail link between Jaffna in the north and rest of the country, event government calls step toward reconciliation and national unity after long civil war.
lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka reopened a rail link between Jaffna and the rest of the country on Monday, an event the government called a step toward reconciliation and national unity after a long civil war.

headline.main: Sri Lanka: Railway Severed by Civil War Reopens
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Railway Severed by Civil War Reopens
